channel.title: JOMS :: 나를 위한 논문 요약
channel.description: Journal of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery (JOMS)의 최신 논문 목록입니다.

item.description: 20250703 발표 논문 목록 아래 목록에서 논문 제목을 클릭하여 내용을 확인하세요. Oral Maxillofacial Surgery Residency Programs: It Is Time for Open and Clear Parental Leave Policies RE: “Coronectomy in Lower Third Molar Surgery: A Systematic Review and Meta-analysis” RE: Patterns of Orbital Fractures Caused by Sports Injuries in Children RE: Does Combining Arthrocentesis With Injectable Platelet-Rich Fibrin Outperform Arthrocentesis or Injectable Platelet-Rich Fibrin Alone in Alleviating Pain and Improving Function in Temporomandibular Joint Dysfunction? July 2025 AAOMS News and Announcements Resident Wellness in Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery: Can We Do Better? RE: Timing a Surgeon’s Retirement: Balancing Experience With Age-Related Decline What Color Is Your Grass? Masthead Evaluation of the radiological results between local and coronal incisions in the treatment of zygomaticomaxillary complex fractures
